entries.text: Thank you for calling our customer service. If you would like to cancel your subscription, please say 'cancel my subscription' to speak with a representative.
Cancel my subscription.
Hello, this is Jamie from customer service. I understand you're looking to cancel your subscription. Can I ask why you wish to do that?
It's just too expensive for me right now.
I understand, and I’m sorry to hear that. We actually have a retention team that can help with finding a better offer. Would you like to be transferred to them?
I just want to cancel my subscription. I don't want deals or offers! I want to close my account!
I completely understand your frustration. However, I’d like to check if there's anything we can do to keep you. The retention team often has solutions.
I’m not interested in solutions. It’s just too expensive for me, and I don’t want to stay. Just let me close my account.
I hear you. Let me transfer you to the retention team, they might have some options that could help.
Hi, this is Alex from the retention team. I understand you want to cancel your subscription. Can you tell me why?
I already said it's too expensive, and I just want to close my account!
I appreciate your feedback. Sometimes we can provide a better offer that might work for you. Are you open to discussing that?
No! I don’t want to discuss offers. I just want to cancel my subscription!
I get that you'd like to cancel, but it would be a shame to miss out on potential savings. Just give it a moment!
This is ridiculous! I’m telling you, I want to close my account, not hear about offers!
I’m really sorry for the inconvenience. Let me just check our policy one last time.
I have no time for this. Just cancel it already!
I really want to assist you. Just a moment please...
I can't believe this! I'm hanging up!
Please don't hang up! I want to help you!
